description:
Note: If you are experiencing lag,
      please download the game and play!     
             
                                              

Godot Wild Jam #53
Theme: Assembly Required
       Wildcard: Thermometer       

         
               


  Apotheosis is a 1-4 player local co-op platforming
shooter that ramps in difficulty.
         Download Parsec to play online with your friends!

  Fight against the enemy to collect scrap and
reassemble the communication tower to reconnect with your lost AI god. 

 Beware, every enemy you kill adds heat. 
The hotter it gets, the faster enemies spawn. 

 Assemble your abilities and upgrade them by using fabrication!




Controller :  Controller Recommended!

Move - Analog stick Move in Menu - D Pad Jump - A Shoot- X Dash - B Open and Close Fabricate- Y Unlockable Abilities: Flamethrower - LB Scope - LT Piercing Shot - RB Shield Pulse - RT

Keyboard/Mouse:

Move - A, D Keys Move in Menu - Mouse Jump - Space Bar Shoot- Left Click Dash - Shift Open and Close Fabricate- F Key Unlockable Abilities: Flamethrower - 1 Scope - 2 Piercing Shot - 3 Shield Pulse - 4

 
                   

 Apotheosis was made using Godot,
 Aseprite, and FL Studio.
